title: Puli Title Track Lyrics Puli Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Puli- Title Track
Singer(s): Mano, Priyadharsini
Movie: Puli
Music: DSP

Enga Makka Enga Makka
Odi vaanga enga makka.
Enga makka onnupatta
edhirikkalaam dandanakka.

Enga Makka Enga Makka
Odi vaanga enga makka.
Enga makka onnupatta
edhirikkalaam dandanakka.

Kaaththirukka neramillada
themmaangu paadum
kaaththukkenna
kaivilangu poda

Kaththi puththi
rendum unduda
emmpaasamulla
thambi thambi
nambi nambi vaadaa

Kodumaiyellaam adipadavae
adimai ellaam vidupadavae
Kizhakku velukka
vizhiyum sivakka
ezhundhu varugudhae

yae puli puli puli puli
puli puli puli puli.
ada manni vittu
vinnai thottu
suttri varum soora puli.

yae puli puli puli puli
puli puli puli puli.
ada achcham vittu
uchcham thottu
vettri perum veera puli

AAthi sokka vandhaan Paaru
Kaatin azhagu raasave
Adi aathi
Kanni ponnu nenjil
Kaadhal kalakum rasaave

Mannai meeraamale
Vidhaum mulaikuma
Thari padaatha noolu enna
Adadai aaguma
Hey raasave raasave

Engal thaai naattaiye
Panjam vandhaaluma
Puli gugayil eli vandhu
Vaalai aatuma

Unnai nee nambi
uzhaithu paaru
Ooru thannale maaradhu
Maatram unnodu
Thodangattum thozha
Vizhikum podhu namadhu kanavu
Palika vendumey

yae puli puli puli puli
puli puli puli puli.
ada manni vittu
vinnai thottu
suttri varum soora puli.

yae puli puli puli puli
puli puli puli puli.
ada achcham vittu
uchcham thottu
vettri perum veera puli

Enga Makka Enga Makka
Odi vaanga enga makka.
Enga makka onnupatta
edhirikkalaam dandanakka.

Sitham kodhikudhey
Raththam thee aaguthey
Yudham seiyya varugavendru
Satham ketkuthey
Hey raasave raasave raasave

Thittam irukanum
Thotta jeikanum
Naan thotta thittam edhum
Thotradhillaye

Vaanam eppodhum
Theerndhapogum
Vaazhvil nambikkai theerathey
Naalai nam kayyil
Vandhae theerum
valadhu kaalai yeduthu vada
Ilaya thozhaney

yae puli puli puli puli
puli puli puli puli.
ada manni vittu
vinnai thottu
suttri varum soora puli.

yae puli puli puli puli
puli puli puli puli.
ada achcham vittu
uchcham thottu
vettri perum veera puli
